title: Time for trouble
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Puppet films
description: Episode of Series "Thomas the tank engine and friends. - New series.". Eight new adventures of the little blue engine, based on the Railway Series by Rev. W. Awdry. 1. "A Scarf for Percy": Percy dreams of a nice warm scarf for his funnel. - 2. "Percy's Promise": Percy makes a promise and despite a terrible storm, brings Annie and Clarabel safely home. - 3. "Time for Trouble": James becomes very proud and boastful when he has to pull the express. - 4. "Gordon and the Famous Visitor": Who is this domeless visitor to the railyard? - 5. "Donald's Duck": Duck is given his own branch line to work on, and makes a new friend. - 6. "Thomas Gets Bumped": Thomas is needlessly jealous. - 7. "Thomas, Percy and the Dragon": Percy has a terrible fright when he meets a huge dragon. - 8. "Diesel Does it Again": Percy and Duck are outraged when Diesel arrives.
related_objects: Series; S01079; Thomas the tank engine and friends. - New series.; Active; 1991
